description:
Yuichi desperately wants to make Shiori’s birthday special, but he can’t seem to think of how - until a chat with Ayu provides just the right inspiration.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ane to Imouto no Lieder ohne Worte
Lieder ohne Worte of an Elder Sister and a Younger Sister
姉と妹の無言歌(リーダ・オーネ・ウォルテ) ~Lieder ohne worte~
